required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 03, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Glycerol Trierucate on Clinical Course of Adrenoleukodystrophy
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Glyceryl Trierucate and Glyceryl Trioleate (Lorenzo's Oil) Therapy in Male Children With Adrenoleukodystrophy

lead_sponsor.agency: Hugo W. Moser Research Institute at Kennedy Krieger, Inc.

clinical_study.source: Hugo W. Moser Research Institute at Kennedy Krieger, Inc.

brief_summary.textblock:
OBJECTIVES: I. Evaluate the clinical efficacy of combination glyceryl trierucate and glyceryl trioleate (Lorenzo's Oil) therapy in boys with X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy.
II. Compare the frequency and severity of neurological disability of study patients with untreated historical controls.

detailed_description.textblock:
PROTOCOL OUTLINE: This is an open label study. Patients must follow dietary instructions as provided by the investigator. Patients receive 2-4 tablespoons of a mixture of glyceryl trierucate and glyceryl trioleate oil once daily. Patients complete a neuropsychological scoring scale questionnaire to measure neurological disability. Patients undergo physical examinations including magnetic resonance imaging and magnetic resonance spectroscopy of the head.
Patients are followed monthly for 6 months, then every 3 months until they reach the age of 13 years or death.

clinical_study.why_stopped: No funding, move to expanded access

primary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Very Long Chain Fatty Acids (VLCFA) Blood Levels
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, an average of 10 years, up to age 13
primary_outcome.description: we will assess the change in very long-chain fatty acids as determined by reduction of blood level baseline C26:0 level.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With T2 MRI Abnormality
secondary_outcome.description: We used MRI to determine the number of participants with T2 MRI abnormality indicating childhood Adrenoleukodystrophy (ALD).

arm_group.description: Treatment of all enrolled participants. Dosage form is a liquid oil taken orally. Dose is to provide 20% of daily calories. Daily for duration of trial

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria.
1. Boys between the age of 18 months and 8 years of age
2. Biochemically proven asymptomatic X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy determined by elevation of very long chain fatty acids or DNA analysis.
3. Platelet count in normal range
Exclusion criteria.
1. Abnormal MRI consistent with childhood cerebral disease
2. Boys who have undergone bone marrow transplantation
3. Other medical condition which in the opinion of the investigator prevents evaluation or treatment

overall_official.affiliation: Hugo W. Moser Research Institute at Kennedy Krieger, Inc.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: An open trial of Lorenzo's oil spanning decades (1998-2013). Centered at the Kennedy Krieger.

group.title: GTO/GTE Treatment
group.description: Intervention: A mixture of glycerol trierucate (GTE) in glycerol trioleate (GTO) in combination with a diet low in saturated fats. GTO/GTE orally; 30-60 ml daily for study period glyceryl trierucate: Glyceryl trierucate is an oil to reduce very long chain fatty acids glyceryl trioleate: Patients receive 2-4 tablespoons of a mixture of glyceryl trierucate and glyceryl trioleate oil once daily.

participants_list.participants: The definition of completed is until the subject wished to stop taking the oil.

measure.description: Male children only were eligible for this study.

event.description: Subject had profound adrenal crisis and died

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
